SummaryEnglish: Way out in the sticks, the fourth-graders of the local school in Tokio village all have their own superpowers of doubtful merit, including flying eyeballs and missile-hair. Ippei and his friends study hard to be ninjas, but they are constantly under treat from the arrogant cheats from the neighbouring village of Techno.

1.SummaryEnglish: A surprise pop quiz sends fourth-graders on a mission to find their school’s motto scroll. Ippei and friends work through traps to complete the challenge.

2.SummaryEnglish: Class is canceled, and jealous classmate Akebi plots to make Agéha “ugly” using a magical potion—but things don’t go as planned.

3.SummaryEnglish: A new transfer student, Kame‑no‑jō, arrives. Ippei’s “eyeball special ops” leads to a clash involving Techno‑village troublemakers.

4.SummaryEnglish: The gang tries odd jobs to buy a bike. They accept a job from a sake vendor and stumble into the domain of the mysterious “Bad Baron.”

5.SummaryEnglish: A banned playground game resurfaces. When Agéha gets hurt, Ippei seeks the “Janken Man” and uncovers his identity.

6.TitleEnglish: We Did It! Ninja Art: Skyhawk
6.SummaryEnglish: Field training at the beach introduces the peculiar “Sand Man.” Ippei’s spying eyes aim to uncover the stranger’s true motives.

7.SummaryEnglish: Agéha’s birthday leads to an invite fiasco. Techno kids, especially Kashi‑o, plot to ruin the celebration when they aren’t invited.

8.SummaryEnglish: When the “Ultra Waterfall” reverses flow, the upside‑down ninja Geghegorō appears—turning the village topsy‑turvy.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ippei wakes to find everyone suffered bedwetting after drinking free juice. He investigates the mysterious “wetting germs.”

10.SummaryEnglish: During a ninja-hide test, Agéha is snatched. A malfunctioning robot and a jealous rival behind the abduction.

11.SummaryEnglish: Winter training in the mountains leads Ippei to a face‑off with a teen ski champion. His flying eyeballs shock onlookers.

12.SummaryEnglish: On Christmas Eve, kids sneak out to meet “Santa” at midnight. It turns out he has hypnotic intentions…

13.TitleEnglish: New Year's Eve with Ghosts and Goblins
13.SummaryEnglish: New Year’s Eve brings a gluttonous ghost from the temple who crashes villagers’ soba—and even drinks beer!
